description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains WBTC and renBTC, an ERC-20 backed by native BTC via Ren's decentralized Darknodes.

en.description: This token represents a Curve liquidity pool. Holders earn fees from users trading in the pool, and can also deposit the LP to Curve's gauges to earn CRV emissions. This pool contains WBTC and renBTC, an ERC-20 backed by native BTC via Ren's decentralized Darknodes.

es.description: Este token representa un grupo de liquidez de Curve. Los titulares obtienen tarifas de los usuarios que comercian en el grupo y también pueden depositar el LP en los gauges de Curve para obtener emisiones de CRV. Este grupo contiene WBTC y renBTC, un ERC-20 respaldado por BTC nativo a través de Darknodes descentralizados de Ren.

zh.description: Curve 的流动性池代币。代币持有者赚取交易费，将代币存入 Curve gauge 还能获得 CRV 奖励。其中包含 WBTC 和 renBTC，renBTC 是由 Ren 发行的以 BTC 为支持的 ERC20 代币。
